data.title: Reverse Challenge
data.solution:
def hmm(A,B):
    l=[A.index(i)+1 for i in B]
    res=[A[i] for i in l]
    print(*res)
in1=int(input())
in2=input().split()
in3=int(input())
in4=input().split()
hmm(in2,in4)

testCases.title: Simple
testCases.testIn:
6
Here There I he am was
3
Here I am
